sentence_zh_TW: 當人們需要醫療幫助時，醫院提供必要的治療和看護。
sentence: When people need medical assistance, the ______ provides the necessary treatment and care.

sentence_zh_TW: 有時候，便宜的產品可能會比昂貴的產品更具價值。
sentence: Sometimes, a ______ product can be more valuable than an expensive one.

sentence_zh_TW: 能夠參加這個節慶活動讓我感到無比的快樂。
sentence: Being able to attend this festival gives me great ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 在進行修理工作時，使用正確的工具非常重要。
sentence: Using the right ______ is essential when carrying out repair work.

sentence_zh_TW: 在特殊場合，穿上一條漂亮的裙子可以讓你看起來很有魅力。
sentence: Wearing a beautiful ______ can make you look attractive on special occasions.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們將在第三十次聚會上舉行一個特別的慶祝活動。
sentence: We will hold a special celebration at our ______ gathering.

sentence_zh_TW: 她的生日聚會上收到了許多可愛的玩偶，讓她十分高興。
sentence: She received many cute ______ for her birthday party, which made her very happy.

sentence_zh_TW: 他每晚都會花時間讀書，這對他的知識增長非常有幫助。
sentence: He spends time every evening to ______ books, which benefits his knowledge growth.

sentence_zh_TW: 我的兄弟總是支持我，無論我面臨什麼挑戰。
sentence: My ______ always supports me, no matter what challenges I face.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了能快速到達目的地，很多人選擇搭乘飛機旅行。
sentence: To reach the destination quickly, many people choose to travel by ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們約定每週見面一次，以討論項目的進展情況。
sentence: We agreed to ______ once a week to discuss the project's progress.

sentence_zh_TW: 在公共場合，與他人互動時保持有禮貌是非常重要的。
sentence: It's very important to be ______ while interacting with others in public settings.

sentence_zh_TW: 學生在寫錯字時，用橡皮擦來修正錯誤是很常見的。
sentence: It's common for students to use an ______ to correct mistakes when they write something wrong.

sentence_zh_TW: 當你準備好後，就可以開始進行這個項目的第一步。
sentence: Once you are ready, you can ______ the first step of this project.

sentence_zh_TW: 在城市中，煙霧往往會影響人們的健康，特別是呼吸系統。
sentence: In the city, the ______ often affects people's health, especially their respiratory systems.

sentence_zh_TW: 尋找你真正熱愛的事情，讓你的人生充滿興趣和意義。
sentence: Finding what you truly love brings ______ and meaning to your life.

sentence_zh_TW: 在餐廳點餐時，我經常選擇中等熟度的牛排，這是我的最愛。
sentence: When ordering at a restaurant, I often choose a ______ steak, which is my favorite.

sentence_zh_TW: 外出時，確保你在包裡攜帶所有必要的物品是很重要的。
sentence: When going out, it's important to ______ all the necessary items in your bag.

sentence_zh_TW: 在現代社會中，電子郵件成為一種主要的溝通方式。
sentence: In modern society, ______ has become a primary means of communication.

sentence_zh_TW: 在音樂會上，音樂的聲音會很大，讓人感到興奮。
sentence: At the concert, the music is very ______, which makes everyone feel excited.
